Welcome to the Earthscope Strain Tools documentation!ÔÉÅ

earthscopestraintools is an open source python-based software package for utilizing borehole strainmeter data.

    • Acquire, decimate, convert the data from raw
    • Corrections
    • Additional Comparisons:
  • Example of looking at high rate event data from a strainmeter
    • Load event data based on USGS event_id
    • Load raw strain data
    • Convert counts to microstrain
    • Interpolate and high pass filter (1000s cutoff)
    • Calculate dynamic strain and estimated magnitude using Barbour et al 2021
    • Plot any co-seismic offsets in regional strains
  • Tidal Calibration
    • Aquire station metadata and decimated timeseries
    • Offset correction
    • Observed tidal analysis
    • Predicted tides
    • Orientation matrix
